dict.acceptation: 不可思议的；惊人的；难以置信的；未必可能的；

sent.orig: The job he did and the help he gave are was incredible, just incredible.
sent.trans: 他所做出的贡献和帮助是令人难以置信的，真的令人难以置信。

sent.orig: Vets can give animals an incredible level of medical care for an incredible price.
sent.trans: 兽医能给动物提供极好的医疗照顾——价格也极昂贵。
他讲的这些，听起来难以相信。

sent.orig: It is incredible that an angle of woman should have married a devil of a man.
sent.trans: 真奇怪，天仙般的女人竟然嫁给了一个恶魔般的男人。
